S3.T1.caption:
Table 1: 
Few-shot Learning Performance on Miniimagenet.
The Code of TAML Has not been Released, So We Reimplemented It and Try Our Best to Tune Hyper-parameters for Its Best Performance.
references:
Experimental results on Miniimagenet are shown in Tab.1.
Note that, for a fair comparison, all compared methods shown in Tab.1 use Conv-4 as their network.
The proposed LWAU apparently outperforms the other methods.
For example, compared with MAML and LLAMA, LWAU promotes the 5-way 1-shot performance for about 2.5% and 1.1%, respectively.

S3.T2.caption: Table 2: Few-shot Classification Performance on Tieredimagenet.
references:
Tab.2 shows the experimental result on Tieredimagenet.
Compared with MAML and TAML, LWAU promotes the 5-way 1-shot performance for about 1.4% and 0.8%, respectively.
Both the experiments on Miniimagenet and Tieredimagenet demonstrate the advantage of the proposed LWAU for the FSIC problem.
